name: Delta
0:
”Alexa, ask Delta to dispense 1 cup”
”Alexa, ask Delta to turn on”
”Alexa, ask Delta to fill coffee pot”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: delta
des:
You can control your Delta® faucet using only your voice. To get started, make sure you have a Delta Voice account registered in the Delta Voice web app and your Delta Voice module is connected to the Touch2O controller and online.

Then, you just need to enable the Delta Voice skill by clicking on the “Enable” button at the top of this screen. Once the skill is enabled, you will be asked to sign in with your Delta Voice account.

When the connection is successfully built, you can simply control your Delta faucet by saying :

- “Alexa, ask Delta to turn on.” 
- “Alexa, ask Delta to turn off.”
- “Alexa, ask Delta to warm up.”
- “Alexa, ask Delta to dispense 1 cup.”
- “Alexa, ask Delta to fill coffee pot.”
